none: Death First - No One Cares demo 2013
Death First - No One Cares demo 2013

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 26, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
When the drums stop and bass starts from underneath the swarm of guitars, I can do nothing but clench my fist. Total hardcore intensity from a band that has sadly called it a day - but they have left us with a brief, powerful legacy. I take exception to the title of their final release, however. NO ONE CARES
